name: Boss Expert Extensions
author: CJ5Boss
description: Expands the production trees of Expert employees Developer, Designer, Lead Developer, and SysAdmin, changing respective recipes. Please see github.com/CJ5-Z/BossExpertExtensions for all related info. This mod requires Boss Basic Addons github.com/CJ5-Z/BossBasicAddons and Boss Beginner Extensions github.com/CJ5-Z/BossBeginnerExtensions and github.com/CJ5-Z/BossIntermediateExtensions to work.
